sys_ui_action.comments:
Written by Jim Coyne - https://community.servicenow.com/people/jim.coyne
Allows a user with the "admin" role to display what data has been added to the g_scratchpad object.
Requires the generic "u_fpc_simple_copy_paste" UI Page to display the results.
sys_ui_action.hint: Displays the contents of the g_scratchpad object in a popup window
sys_ui_action.name: Show Contents of g_scratchpad (scoped)
